author: Special Correspondent
text:
A peer team of the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) visited Vivekanandha Institute of Engineering and Technology for Women for accreditation recently.

The three-member peer team led by H. P. Khincha, former Vice-Chancellor, Visvesvaraya Technological University, Belgaum, interacted with K.C.K. Vijayakumar, Principal, on admission process, teaching methods followed, performance of students, research and development facilities, co-curricular and extra curricular activities of the departments, achievements of students and faculty, research publications etc.

The team members visited all the departments and verified the records.

They also reviewed the facilities available in hostel, library tec.

They made enquiry on the activities of the Placement Cell and NSS units.

They interacted with the staff and students separately and collected feedbacks.
title: NAAC team visits college
